ValidationRule.description: Validate field วันที่ลูกค้าทำรายการ
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: If( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ) < DATE(2019,06,21) ,false ,If( AND(OR(Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0001', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0002', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0003', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0004', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0005', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0006', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0007', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0008', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0009', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0010', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0011', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0012', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0013', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0014', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0015', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0016', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0017', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0018', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0019', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0020', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0021', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0022', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12323', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12324', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12325', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12326', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12327', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12345', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12346', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12347', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12348', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12423', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12424', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12425', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12426', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12427', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12428', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12429', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12430', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12431', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12432', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12433', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12434', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12435' ), ISBLANK(Transaction_Date__c),NOT( Is_Migrated__c )), true,false))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: กรุณาระบุค่า
